alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fairfield and south central New Haven Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wilton, or near Norwalk, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, New Haven, Norwalk, Milford, Shelton, New Canaan, Fairfield, Stratford, Trumbull, Westport, Darien, Monroe, Wilton, Seymour and Orange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven
